entry.body:
## Information

This article is currently in draft, as I am sourcing material to reference.
The premise will be to look at the abstract influence that this unique west and east cultural friendship produced.

[Vintage footage of George and Ravi](https://youtu.be/mwb3tHWQJEY?t=2566) , thought it was a great throwback!
I will try to include various pieces of unique content that I find directly inside of the article.

---

## Covers

Popular Beatles covers that you might enjoy!

### 7stringist

- The [Within You Without You: Cover in The Beatles' original style ビートルズ原曲スタイルでのカバー](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KOD5oRMf7GQ)
- One of the best covers, it is the power of multi-cultural influence and soft power.

data.title: Ravi and the Beatles
data.description: This article is dedicated to the historical friendship between Ravi Shankar and George Harrison.
data.author: KBVE Team
